name: Love Ur Curves
description:
Save ur Smouls:

You met your demise and now you must roll.
You know it will end at some point but it doesn't matter because your cruise record will be set in stone for ever. So you draw with Purfollet energy and you roll further. Every time a bit further. And perhaps somewhere in the process you will love ur curves...
And there's more!  You can compete with others using the leaderbord and roll to infinity (and maybe obtain some glory among your peers). 

Features:
  • Draw lines and roll through an infinite skyscape
  • Choose one of the 8 differents Smouls available
  • Compare score with the Global Leaderboard
  • Interact with us and request features (and bug fixes obviousadly)
    •  
Play it:
  • On Android: .apk file in the Download section
  • On Android: link to Google Play available bellow
  • On Browser: We put an WebGL version online here (note that the full game is the mobile version, some features like the leaderboard might not be there)
  • On iOs : under discussion
Interact with Us: DiscordReport BugRequest Feature/Suggestion
